definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="5"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon horse ~ ~ ~ {Tame:1,SaddleItem:{id:saddle,Count:1},Variant:</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:horsePattern</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:horseColor</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.movement_speed",Base:</field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:horseMoveSpeed</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">f},{Name:"minecraft.horse.jump_strength",Base:0.4}]}</field></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
